## Description

This script includes codes for backwards elimination and diagnostic plots.

```{r}
library(lme4)
library(DHARMa)

# Backwards elimination started from a full model
GLMM <- lme4::lmer (rt ~ (automation+nback+runNumber)^2+(1+automation+nback|subNumber),data = df2,REML=FALSE)

# Get and compare xxxxx,
drop1(GLMM,test="Chisq")

# Remove item that minimize AIC in sequence (always removing interaction effects first before removing subordinate main effects).
GLMM <- update(GLMM, .~. -automation:runNumber)
GLMM <- update(GLMM, .~. -nback:runNumber)
GLMM <- update(GLMM, .~. -runNumber)

# Q-Q plots and Residual Plots
res = simulateResiduals(GLMM)
plot(res)

```
